title: HOUR 1 - Herbert, Patriots, Raiders, Mayfield
itunes:title: HOUR 1 - Herbert, Patriots, Raiders, Mayfield
description:
Justin Herbert has the ability to take the Chargers far

The Patriots don't have any playmakers

The Raiders are still very popular in Los Angeles

Baker Mayfield isn't a top tier QB and that's fine for the Browns


Guest: Peter Schrager

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
